name: CLUMSIER_VEIL
description:
Originally released: 28th January 2018.
Created for Global Game Jam 2018.

Working to protect their utopian homeland from dangerous rebels, a government official must use increasingly complex ciphers to decode enemy messages.

This game supports autosaving.

A game by Georgia Wilkins & Josef Frank for Caveware Digital.

Thank you to Simon Cheu, Joshua Lee, and Joshua Miranda.

BUGS

  • We are aware of a bug where sometimes text input doesn't work. Since the game autosaves, simply refresh the browser to try and fix this. We will try and fix this eventually... maybe.
